Description.div:
Stores milestones attached to a status. Either StatusMilestoneKey or a unique combination of ProcessTypeKey, Status, DateTypeId and MilestoneLevel has to be passed to get the details for a StatusMilestone.
If existing StatusMilestoneKey or a unique combination of ProcessTypeKey, Status, DateTypeId and MilestoneLevel is not passed.

If CallingOrganizationCode is passed, then it will be used as the context organization. This, combined with the configuration data setup for status milestones, will result in data filtered for access by the given organization.
